title: SQLDROP VIEW Keyword

metadata.description: Learn about SQLDROP VIEW Keyword with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Reference

❯
DROP VIEW
The
DROP VIEW
command deletes a view.
The following SQL drops the "Brazil Customers" view:
Example
DROP VIEW [Brazil Customers];

Reference

❯
★
+1
